plot: Recent divorcée Julia Wallace prefers trying to run the family-owned coffee shop to dating, but her much-married mother Shirley won't let her give up on love.
plot_en: Recent divorcée Julia Wallace prefers trying to run the family-owned coffee shop to dating, but her much-married mother Shirley won't let her give up on love.
plot_es: Recent divorcée Julia Wallace prefers trying to run the family-owned coffee shop to dating, but her much-married mother Shirley won't let her give up on love.
title: Maybe This Time
